alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL RIO ARRIBA AND NORTH CENTRAL SANDOVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Regina and Lindrith, or 8 to 12 miles north of Cuba, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuba, Lindrith, Regina, Gallina and La Jara. This includes Highway 550 between Mile Markers 63 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands
